thread.section_title: ESPN FC - UEFA Champions League News
thread.title: Barcelona's historic comeback disguises lasting flaws
thread.title_full: Barcelona's historic comeback disguises lasting flaws

author: Mike L. Goodman
title: Barcelona's historic comeback disguises lasting flaws
text:
15 hours ago Barcelona's historic comeback disguises lasting flaws Commentators from around the world try and put Barcelona's last gasp UCL winner against PSG into words. A look at the topsy turvy journey that was Barcelona's Champions League last-16 tie with PSG. 
There is nothing that can explain the last 10 minutes of Barcelona's stunning comeback against Paris Saint-Germain. Needing three goals to advance, Barcelona somehow conjured a gorgeous free kick from Neymar, a (questionable at best) penalty on Suarez and unlikely set piece goal from Sergi Roberto to move through. It was an incredible comeback, but one which doesn't provide much insight into Barcelona beyond sheer awe. ...
